item.title: LAMBDA functions - Build your own Excel formulas easily
item.description: You could create your own Excel functions using VBA since long time ago, but there is a new way of creating them: LAMBDA functions. As of today, this option is only available for Office Insiders participants, but it will be soon available to the general public. The LAMBDA function official documentation is great but let me show you how this works with an actual example. Imagine that you have a requirement where you need to calculate something as easy as the days that are left in the month for a given date.
